FINANCE OFFICER

SUMMARY

Profile: An experience Accountant and data base worker who has developed a strong accounting background working with Data Base and Accounting packages for over four years.
Team oriented individual with good interpersonal skill and a demonstrated ability to accurately evaluate customer requirement and complete related tasks / project which satisfy or exceed customer requirement on time. .
I have the ability to create conducive atmosphere with colleagues at work.
Keen, presentable and goal getter, effective team member, trust worthy, reliable and well organize team player.
Confident working alone and with senior authorities, creative and enjoys using own initiatives.
Flexible and can adapt to work in wide range of tasks.
I have the ability to work within tight schedules and outside official hours.
Highlights
Analytical reasoning Compliance testing knowledge Financial statement analysis
Account reconciliation expert Financial planner Effective time management

ACCOMPLISHMENTS

Achieved 25% cost reduction by eliminating redundant processes.
Formally recognized for excellence achieved in financial analysis, budgeting and forecasting.

EXPERIENCE

<JD_START>
Job Title: Chief Financial Officer (CFO)

Location: North Carolina, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Analyst, Finance

Description:
Our client, a reputable Private Equity firm, is seeking a CFO to join the team of one of their portfolio businesses. The company is recognized for producing outdoor power equipment, trailers, and auto accessories, with strong partnerships with major hardlines retailers across the US and Canada. Additionally, their products are distributed by regional and local retailers, independents, value-add distributors, and sold directly to consumers through their online marketplace.
Job Summary:
Proactively monitor, drive, and report the financial performance of the business in accordance with GAAP and external lender requirements.Prepare and present month-end financials and reporting packages for internal leadership, Board of Directors, and external lenders.Drive financial performance through commercial analytics, pricing, and sales support.Manage cash flow, including monitoring receivables, complying with debt covenants, and ensuring timely vendor payments.Establish an infrastructure for growth by improving visibility, implementing disciplined routines, and streamlining processes across all business functions.Collaborate with the CEO and Leadership team on company-wide initiatives and daily execution.

Key Duties and Responsibilities:
Leading and driving efficiency initiatives throughout the organization, while also providing direct support and collaboration with the CEO and Leadership team.Overseeing the Annual Budget and Planning Process, including setting financial targets and monitoring their execution.Crafting comprehensive financial models and conducting both quantitative and qualitative analyses with a strong emphasis on commercial analytics.Implementing and managing new financial systems, policies, and processes to enhance visibility, drive cost reductions, and improve operational efficiencies across all departments.Creating board presentations, conducting ad hoc analyses, and providing project updates on key strategic initiatives.Delivering financial results presentations at quarterly board and senior leadership meetings, including identifying risks, opportunities, and recommendations to enhance and maintain financial performance.
Qualifications:
Minimum of 10 years of advancing experience in finance and accounting, with at least 5 years in a senior leadership capacity (e.g., CFO, VP Finance).Bachelor's degree in accounting or finance required; Master's degree and/or CPA preferred.At least 5 years of Corporate FP&A experience in a manufacturing company.Proficiency with Business Intelligence tools like Power BI.Strong command of MS Excel and MS Dynamics.Demonstrated ability in problem-solving, performing well under pressure, and achieving results.25% travel expected.

Experience Level (if available): Executive
<JD_END>
